title: Privacy Policy - Conference Programs
content:
SIGCHI Policies

Here you could find and check SIGCHI Privacy policy and Terms of Use. SIGCHI's mission is to provide an opportunity for sharing knowledge between professionals and connect them together for further researches that would impact people's lives. We respect our users' privacy and would like to be transparent about the data we collect about you, how it is used and how we keep this information safe. These policies are applied when you use our services.
